func crossRotate(self: var Field) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [],
                                    forbids: [].}
Rotates the binary field by 180 degrees in groups of three columns. Ghost cells are cleared before the rotation. Source   Edit   
func del(self: var Field; row: Row; col: Col) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Deletes the cell and shifts the field. If (row, col) is in the air, shifts the field downward above where deleted. If it is in the water, shifts the field upward below where deleted. Source   Edit   
func dropNuisance(self: var Field; counts: array[Col, int]; hard = false;
                  requireSettled = false) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Drops nuisance puyos. This function requires that the counts are non-negative. If requireSettled is true, this function also requires that the field is settled but becomes faster. Source   Edit

func insert(self: var Field; row: Row; col: Col; cell: Cell) {.inline, noinit,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Inserts the cell and shifts the field. If (row, col) is in the air, shifts the field upward above where inserted. If it is in the water, shifts the field downward below where inserted. Source   Edit

    forbids: [].}
